rooms.description: A small foyer with a reception desk, adhering to Vastu principles by positioning entrance facing North-East.
Open-concept Scandinavian design featuring minimalistic decor and abundant natural light through large windows positioned on the South-West wall in line with local norms for sunlight exposure.

Compact yet functional kitchen integrated with a dining area, featuring energy-efficient appliances and sustainable materials, following Scandinavian aesthetics while respecting Vastu by avoiding clutter near the entrance.
Private studio apartment combining living space and bedroom functionalities, with built-in storage solutions and soft color palettes; includes a small balcony for fresh air as per local requirements.

openings.description: A reinforced steel door with glass panels, ensuring security while adhering to Vastu principles by facilitating a positive energy flow.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows in strategic positions to maximize natural light and provide scenic views of the swimming pool area.
A dedicated entrance leading to an outdoor swimming pool, designed with weather-resistant materials.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a Scandinavian design aesthetic featuring a minimalist decor, ample storage, and north-facing windows for optimum natural light.
Well-appointed bathroom with modern fixtures and Vastu-compliant layout to ensure privacy and proper ventilation.

openings.description: A central staircase designed in a Scandinavian style with metal accents, ensuring smooth transition between levels and following safety norms.
Balcony overlooking the swimming pool area; serves as an outdoor relaxation space and is designed to balance aesthetics with functionality in accordance with local building codes.
